description: Lists all of the tags associated with the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that you specify. The resource can be a user, server, or role.

parameters.name: Arn
parameters.description: Requests the tags associated with a particular Amazon Resource Name (ARN). An ARN is an identifier for a specific Amazon Web Services resource, such as a server, user, or role.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The ARN you specified to list the tags of.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: When you can get additional results from the ListTagsForResource call, a NextToken parameter is returned in the output. You can then pass in a subsequent command to the NextToken parameter to continue listing additional tags.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: Key-value pairs that are assigned to a resource, usually for the purpose of grouping and searching for items. Tags are metadata that you define.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The name assigned to the tag that you create.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: Contains one or more values that you assigned to the key name you create.
